edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse

Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.GameObject
      • edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.Room
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<GameObject>

    public class Room
extends GameObject
    This class represents intances of room objects. They have the unique quality of being able to carry the bomb. If the Player finds the bomb within the room, the game ends. There are also instances of empty rooms on the Grid.
    Author:
    Andrew Nipp, Andrew Niklas, Ben Nickerson
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String BRIEFCASE_NAME
      This field represents a constant String containing "[B]", the symbol for a bomb.
      private boolean briefcaseRoom
      This field represents a boolean that is true when the Room contains the bomb and false otherwise.
      private int objID
      This field represents the unique ID of the object, used for comparing two GameObjects
      private java.lang.String ROOM_NAME
      This field represents a constant String containing "[R]", the symbol for a general Room object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Room()
      Sets up the standard room name and the GameObject.setObjId(int)
      Room(boolean isBriefcase)
      Checks to see if the room we are accessing is the briefcase room, if it is then it will set briefcaseRoom to true, and set the GameObject.setRealName(String) to BRIEFCASE_NAME.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeRoomState(boolean change)
      Changes the name of the briefcase room to show BRIEFCASE_NAME
      boolean isBriefcaseRoom()
      Used to check if the room is a briefcase room

    • Constructor Detail

      • Room

        public Room()
        Sets up the standard room name and the GameObject.setObjId(int)

      • Room

        public Room(boolean isBriefcase)
        Checks to see if the room we are accessing is the briefcase room, if it is then it will set briefcaseRoom to true, and set the GameObject.setRealName(String) to BRIEFCASE_NAME. If not then it will set the room name to ROOM_NAME
        Parameters:
        isBriefcase - -A boolean that determines the name of the Room with the briefcase

        Changes the name of the briefcase room to show BRIEFCASE_NAME
        Parameters:
        change - The boolean for changing the name of the room

        public boolean isBriefcaseRoom()
        Used to check if the room is a briefcase room
